recipe.title: Banana Bread Instant Oatmeal Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: ¾ cup ; water, or milk, boiling ; (175 g)

steps.step: Add the instant oatmeal, freeze-dried bananas, walnuts, vanilla bean, and sugar into a mason jar.
Store in a cool, dry place for up to a month.
To prepare, pour boiling water or milk over oats. Stir to combine and let sit for 3 minutes.
Serve with walnuts and fresh sliced bananas. Enjoy!
